result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Victor Manuel Perez-Vallejo

records.addlTxt:
2:24 PM Prosecuting attorney Alexander Huber in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Victor Manuel Perez-Vallejo in court.  Attorney Patrick Kiernan Cafferty in court for Victor Manuel Perez-Vallejo. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Attorney Cafferty is requesting an adjournment as he needs to complete his investigation on the DE's prior record as he is waiting on records from another state.. The State does not object. Court adjourns.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.
WCS Supervision Status Report.  In order to satisfy all the program requirements, the defendant must complete primary treatment and pay the remaining balance on the client service fee.

09:12 AM   State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers. Defendant, Victor Manuel Perez-Vallejo, appeared with Attorney Patrick Kiernan Cafferty.  Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Attorney Cafferty is requesting an adjournment as he needs to complete his investigation on the DE's prior record. The State does not object. Court adjourns.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
WCS Supervision Status Report.  In order to satisfy all the program requirements, the defendant must complete primary treatment and pay the remaining balance on the client service fee.

records.addlTxt: Defendant, Victor Manuel Perez-Vallejo, appeared with Attorney Patrick Kiernan Cafferty.    Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State. Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.
